item.title: Pokémon TCG Pocket New Packs Release Period—A2 Set Latest
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/pokemon-tcg-pocket-new-packs-release/

The next set of new Pokémon TCG Pocket packs is all anyone wants. Genetic Apex has carried the game through a strong beginning, but it’s time for A2 to drop, change the meta, and make collections bigger.

I do every mission, get all rewards, complete events, and open booster packs. As a result, I need very few new cards. I yearn for a new Pokémon TCG Pocket set, and the rumored A2 booster set could be the cure. Mythical Island was Pocket’s first proper mini-set, and it had some bangers—Celebi ex is a pain, right?

But it’s time to move on to bigger and better things. New packs for Pokémon TCG Pocket can breathe new life into the mobile game, and here’s the latest on set two.

Do we Know the Pokémon TCG Pocket New Packs Release Date?

The new Pokémon TCG Pocket packs don’t have an official release date, but it’s widely accepted set two AKA Set A2 is dropping at the end of January 2025—likely January 29.

January 2025’s closing days are huge for Pokémon TCG Pocket. Trading is finally coming, along with the rumored and much-anticipated A2 set.

Trading was confirmed by Pokémon TCG Pocket’s X social media page. This is a lock, however; Set A2’s current information is purely from leaks and datamines.

Pokémon TCG Pocket A2 Expansion Leaks and Rumors

The Pokémon TCG Pocket A2 expansion is believed to be another major booster set featuring over 200 new cards.

Genetic Apex is set one, Mythical Island is mini-set one, and A2 is set two. Get ready for tons of new cards, ex beasts, and Full Art beauties we’re never going to pull. We’ll probably get new Crown rarity pulls too.

Social media personality PokeGirlLauren posted the game’s future content plans in a message on X at the beginning of November: “Mini #PokemonTCGPocket Set A1a to be released 16th December. The 2nd set ‘A2″ will be released 29th January, will contain around 230 cards, and is expected to totally change the meta. Plans are for 4 new sets and 4 mini sets a year.”

We know the A1a leak was true, and this was part of the rumored next expansion leaks way back. Developers Creatures Inc. and DeNA seem to be leaving the same amount of team between set releases. This makes a January 29 release for A2 extremely likely.

As for Set Two’s contents, this remains a mystery. Genetic Apex is primarily a Kanto region set, and the assumption is set two is Johto-focused. We take nothing for granted in this respect—always expect the unexpected.

Social media is rife with supposed leaks of A2 card designs, but we remain skeptical. Unlike the concrete leaks for set launches and dates, we’ve seen nothing regarding A2’s designs or cards. I’d recommend you take any Set A2 designs with a mountain’s worth of salt for now.

How many Hourglasses have you already saved up for the A2 Set? Do you have Gold in reserve for opening more packs to get a headstart? Let us know your best pulls so far ahead of a fun period in Pokémon TCG Pocket.

Also, make sure you know how to get Flair in Pocket, as well as the latest Promo Card 8 details.

item.title: Baldur’s Gate 3 Patch 8 Stress Test Will be Hosted End of January
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/baldurs-gate-3-patch-8-stress-test-will-be-hosted-end-of-january/

Larian Studios has confirmed a Baldur’s Gate 3 Patch 8 stress test for Xbox, PlayStation, and PC players at the end of January 2025. 

Baldur’s Gate 3 Patch 8 stress test will require players to test the next update’s features to the fullest extent. Developers want to try their hands “at breaking things” while they add the finishing touches to the patch. Players can also try the new cross-play feature during the upcoming stress test. 

Baldur’s Gate 3 Cross-Play Arrives Soon

To use the cross-play Baldur’s Gate 3 Patch 8 stress test, players must invite their friends through the Larian Network. Platforms, including Xbox, PlayStation, and PC, can try this feature. Mac users cannot participate in the stress test; however, they will receive the cross-play features once the full update goes live. 

How to register for Baldur’s Gate 3 Patch 8 Stress Test

Players must visit Larian’s website and sign up to register for the upcoming stress test. Xbox users can participate by downloading the Xbox Insider Hub App and becoming an Xbox Insider. Once the stress test starts, they can playtest directly from the app. 

Baldur’s Gate 3 Patch 8 Features

Apart from cross-play, players can try out several new features with Baldur’s Gate 3 Patch. A new photo mode will be added, and the developers have released a collage of images to show the potential of this feature in their blog post. The developers will also add a new subclass for each of the 12 classes to add new ways to experience the game. To learn more about Baldur’s Gate 3 patch 8, check out Insider Gaming’s guide on the update.

item.title: Pokemon TCG Pocket Trading Features Revealed
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/pokemon-tcg-pocket-trading-features/

Pokemon TCG Pocket has just revealed how the upcoming trading feature will work in the game. 

Pokemon TCG Pocket was set to receive a new trading feature in January 2025, and before its arrival, the developers have revealed how players can trade their cards in the game. There are limitations to the feature, such as you can only trade with friends, and not all rarities can be traded. Check out how this trade feature works in Pokemon TCG Pocket below. 

  • Players will only be allowed to trade with friends. 
  • You cannot trade cards of different rarities; both cards must be the same. 
  • When Pokemon TCG Pocket’s trade feature arrives, some cards from the Genetic Apex and Mythical Island cards can be traded. The selection of booster pack players 
  • Players can only trade cards with one-diamond to four-diamond rarity cards and one-star cards.
  • Lastly, players will have to consume the items to trade them. 

The developers of Pokemon TCG Pocket will observe how the community responds to the trading feature and assess future updates accordingly. Additionally, they have announced that the next set of Pokemon TCG Pocket Booster Packs will be released this month; more details about the packs will arrive soon. 

The Pokemon TCG Pocket community is not very happy about the capabilities of the upcoming feature at launch. Players are concerned about the limited trading options, which will hamper their collection completion. Other players have also expressed disappointment about not being able to trade two-star and three-star cards.

item.title: Apex Legends X Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth Event Announced
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/apex-legends-x-final-fantasy-7-rebirth-event-announced/

To celebrate the arrival of Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth of PC, Apex Legends is hosting a special event called Lunar Rebirth Collection on January 21, 2025. 

As a part of the Lunar Rebirth Collection event, Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth Items such as Buster Sword R2R5, Hop-Ups and Materia have returned to Apex Legends. Players will also be able to grab the 36 returning FF 7 Cosmetics Items and 6 Iconic Legends skins available for direct purchase in the store. There’s also a Lunar Rebirth Reward track, which provides players with additional rewards. 

Buster Sword and Materia Return to Apex Legends

Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth’s Buster Sword and Materia will be available to try in Apex Legends during the Lunar Rebirth Collection event. The Buster Sword can be used to deal damage through light and heavy attacks; players can also use its colossal size to block attacks. Additional abilities include dashing and the iconic Limit Break, whose meter fills whenever the player deals, takes or blocks damage. 

Rift Relics can provide players with Materia Hop-Ups, which increase effects and bonuses. Blue Materia can heal the player by absorbing the damage you inflict on enemies. Green Materia can emit a shock nova that damages and slows nearby enemies. Purple Materia increases the crit rate for the player. Lastly, the Red Materia allows players to summon a Nessie companion. 

To learn more about Apex Legends X Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth event’s collection items, reward track and store tab, check out the blog post here.

item.title: All PGA Tour 2K25 Editions & What’s Included
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/all-pga-tour-2k25-editions/

Another PGA Tour title, another dilemma about which edition to buy. PGA Tour 2K25 has more editions than I have holes-in-one (zero, for what’s it worth), and each one has a unique selling point designed to pull you you in.

PGA Tour 2K25 is the next iteration of 2K’s next-gen golf game. 2K23 was a step up from 2K21, but 2025’s big dog is ready to eat. It’s sporting new courses and revamped features across the board. It’s like the excitement of the new Driver season where you can’t wait to see what the big brands have been cooking up.

2K hasn’t just been hard at work on gameplay and longevity, we have new editions to peruse.

Every PGA Tour 2K25 Edition

A Standard, Deluxe, and Legend Edition are available to pre-order for PGA Tour 2K25.

Choosing a new launch’s edition is the equivalent of standing on a tee and deciding whether to slice the ball OB or snap hook it in the trees. All options are possible—and inevitable—but the choice is a tough one.

If 2K25 is your first foray into simulated golf or a new season in your accomplished career, we’ll help you with this agonizing decision.

PGA Tour 2K25 Standard Edition Explained

Standard is the basic edition of PGA Tour 2K25. It comes with the game—a cool pre-order bonus—and that’s it! If you’re mainly after 2K25 in its most basic and simplistic form (and cheapest), the Standard Edition is probably the one for you.

Here’s everything you get with the Standard Edition of PGA Tour 2K25:

  • A base copy of PGA Tour 2K25.
  • Extra Butter x Adidas Pack
    • Chris McDonald Playable Character (Shooter McGavin from Happy Gilmore).
    • Extra Butter X Adidas Hat.
    • Extra Butter X Adidas Jacket.
    • Extra Butter X Adidas Shoes.

PGA Tour 2K25 Deluxe Edition Explained

Upgrading to the Deluxe Edition gives you a few extra yards off the tee—probably not, but you never know. I can say for sure you get the game, the pre-order bonus, Early Access, and a few more goodies. The Deluxe Edition might be digital-only, meaning you have to buy it from an online storefront if you want it.

This is everything included in 2K25 Deluxe Edition:

  • 7-Day Early Access.
  • A base copy of PGA Tour 2K25.
  • Extra Butter x Adidas Pack
    • Chris McDonald Playable Character (Shooter McGavin from Happy Gilmore).
    • Extra Butter X Adidas Hat.
    • Extra Butter X Adidas Jacket.
    • Extra Butter X Adidas Shoes.
  • The Birdie Pack
    • Titleist GT4 Driver.
    • Titleist Golf Ball Cosmetic.
    • FootJoy Premiere Series Shoes.
    • Umbrella Hat.
  • The Starter Pack
    • 1 Evo Tool.
    • 5 Level-Up Tokens.
    • 5 Club Fittings.
    • 3 Ball Fittings.
    • 1,800 VC.
  • Early Birdie Bonus (Pre-order Bonus)
    • TaylorMade SIM Driver.
    • Bad Birdie Golf Ball.
    • 1 Level-Up Token.
    • 500 VC.
  • PGA TOUR 2K23 Standard Digital Edition.

PGA Tour 2K25 Legend Edition Explained

If you didn’t think your bag could get any more full, in steps PGA Tour 2K25 Legend Edition. Again, this seems to be a digital-only edition. But getting it gets you six extra bundles to go along with Early Access and the game itself. This is for the ultimate golf enthusiast and also Tiger Woods fans.

I’ve rounded up the mammoth mountain of bonuses included in the Legend Edition:

  • 7-Day Early Access.
  • A base copy of PGA Tour 2K25.
  • Extra Butter x Adidas Pack
    • Chris McDonald Playable Character (Shooter McGavin from Happy Gilmore).
    • Extra Butter X Adidas Hat.
    • Extra Butter X Adidas Jacket.
    • Extra Butter X Adidas Shoes.
  • The Birdie Pack
    • Titleist GT4 Driver.
    • Titleist Golf Ball Cosmetic.
    • FootJoy Premiere Series Shoes.
    • Umbrella Hat.
  • The Starter Pack
    • 1 Evo Tool.
    • 5 Level-Up Tokens.
    • 5 Club Fittings.
    • 3 Ball Fittings.
    • 1,800 VC.
  • Early Birdie Bonus (Pre-order Bonus)
    • TaylorMade SIM Driver.
    • Bad Birdie Golf Ball.
    • 1 Level-Up Token.
    • 500 VC.
  • Sun Day Red Pack
    • SUN DAY RED Red Polo.
    • SUN DAY RED Black Hat.
    • SUN DAY RED Black Pants.
    • SUN DAY RED White Glove.
    • Tiger’s TaylorMade Driver Qi10.
  • Malbon Bucket Ball Pack
    • 3 unique Malbon cosmetic balls
  • PGA Tour 2K25 Member’s Pass
    • Clubhouse Pass Premium (Seasons 1-5)
    • Clubhouse Gear Pack—one outfit per body type per season; Season 1 items available at launch
  • PGA TOUR 2K23 Standard Digital Edition.

Whatever your inclination toward editions, it’s fair to say PGA Tour 2K25’s more expensive editions are packing the goods. Are you tempted to shell out on the Deluxe or Legend Edition? Let us know.

Check out the full PGA Tour 2K25 reveal and its debut trailer to get a taste of what’s to come.

item.title: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth Receives Steam Deck Verification
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/final-fantasy-7-rebirth-steam-deck/

Announced today, Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth PC will be playable on the Steam Deck on release day.

When Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth PC is released on January 23, 2024, Steam Deck owners can play the game anywhere they want: on the train, in the park, on a flight, or in the car. The official announcement post also features the game running on the handheld console, and it seems the device can handle the title seamlessly, with no visible stuttering or performance issues. 

To celebrate the arrival of Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth on Steam Deck, Square Enix has revealed a limited-edition Fluffy Chocobo Steam Deck. The custom edition covers the entire handheld console in bright yellow Chocobo feathers. The game developers have stated that they don’t advise wrapping up “high-tech gaming gear in fur at home, ” so they have made the casing removable.

Apart from the Steam Deck, FF 7 Rebirth PC will be best experienced on a desktop where you can take advantage of enhanced features such as 120fps, refined lighting, improved environment detail, and more detailed textures. Depending on your setup, you can also benefit from improved framerates and image quality with NVIDIA DLSS. Check out the system requirements for Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth PC.  

In other news, check out Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth’s PC features, which include numerous graphical options, better lighting, enhanced visuals and more. Will you be playing Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth on the Steam Deck? Let us know in the comments below or our community forum!
